page.title: 20PARISH COUNCIL
page.content: {The Parish Council}consists of 6 members, elected for four years and a part-time clerk. It nominates 2 primary school governors, is the trustee of Tackley Heath and provides allotments. It provides and maintains the street lighting and safeguards the field footpaths by walking them once a year. It obtained a loan to give a grant towards the{village hall.} The latest project was the purchase, drainage and seeding of land to add to the{playing fields}and{children's play {area}which the council controls. Observations on planning applications to the {District Council}are seen as a major part of its duty. It presses the {County Council}for road repairs and improvements. Its main aim, though, is to encourage self-help in the village.
